ygData.subject: RE: Char Carillion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Never seen one.  I heard in one of the recent patches it was made nodrop.  I m fairly certain it is because the head GM was called down to SolB resolve the
ygData.messageBody:
> and the crown of king tranix is not no drop, i know someone who traded for
> one. what was up with that story about the cleric who looted it? or am i
> way off.

Never seen one. I heard in one of the recent patches it was made
nodrop. I'm fairly certain it is because the head GM was called
down to SolB resolve the issue, and she simply destroyed the helm
after saying she couldnt/wouldnt transfer the item.

All the pictures of the crown I see are a droppable item, but since
I dont have the crown, does anyone know?

Harm.
